name: Giesecke & Devrient
goal: With over 160 years of experience, G+D is actively helping shape one of the most important trends of the future: security. The long established technology group creates confidence in global payment transactions, modern communication, digital identities, and data security, by providing innovative products and solutions.
interests: Budget, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Digitaler Binnenmarkt; Binnenmarktthemen
- Payment Services
- Cybersecurity
- Handelspolitik
- F&E
